title: Project CARS - FitGirl
description:
Project CARS (v3.0 + All DLCs, MULTI8) [FitGirl Repack, 100% Lossless]


::Information::


Release Date: May 6, 2015
Genres/Tags: Racing, Simulation, 3D
Developer: Slightly Mad Studios
Publisher: Slightly Mad Studios
Platform: PC [Repack]
Engine: Madness
Steam User Rating: 77% of user reviews are positive (based on 3,757 reviews)

Interface Language: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Polish, Portuguese-Brazil, Russian
Audio Language: English
Crack: built-in (RELOADED, 3DM, ALI213, REVOLT - at your choice)


::Repack Features::


Based on RELOADED ISO release: rld-prca.iso (16,595,058,688 bytes)
The following udates applied one after another (~6 GB total): Project.CARS.Update.v1.4.Incl.DLC.Repack-RELOADED, Project.CARS.Update.v2.0-RELOADED, Project.CARS.Update.v2.5.Incl.DLC-RELOADED & Project.CARS.Update.v3.0-RELOADED
All available DLCs included & activated: Limited Edition Upgrade, Modified Car Pack, Racing Icons Pack, Audi Ruapuna Speedway Expansion Pack & Logitech Liveries
Additional cracks from 3DM, ALI213 & REVOLT added. The REVOLT crack allows limited multiplayer, read the NFO in the NoDVD folder
MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 21.3 to 9.3 GB)
Installation time is pretty long. It takes ~1.5 hours on 8-cores CPUs, ~2 hours on 4-cores & 3+ hours on 2-cores. Mind this before downloading and installing - maybe for you it will be faster to download full uncompressed version + patches.
HDD space after installation: 18 GB (~53 GB while installing)
Repack by FitGirl
